title: agent-json 1.0
description: A minimal, domain-hosted facts file for AI agents. Domain-owner asserted facts with optional evidence links.

schema_version.description: Schema version for this document. Must be '1.0' for agent-json v1.

subject.description: Describes what this file is about (the subject being described by the domain owner).

domain.description: The domain asserting these facts (the domain hosting /.well-known/agent.json).

type.description: Optional subject type (e.g., organization, product, service, project, dataset, community, other).

urls.description: Optional canonical URLs for context (homepage, docs, status, support, privacy, terms, etc.).

facts.description: List of domain-owner asserted facts. Each fact is a small claim with an optional evidence list.

key.description: Stable identifier for the fact (recommended: lowercase snake_case).

value.description: The value of the fact. Can be any valid JSON type (string/number/bool/object/array/null).

notes.description: Optional short clarifier to prevent misinterpretation.

evidence.description: Optional list of URLs supporting the fact (prefer same-domain URLs when possible).

last_reviewed.description: ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) indicating when the domain owner last reviewed this file.

expires.description: Optional ISO 8601 date (YYYY-MM-DD) after which this file should be treated as stale if not updated.

language.description: Optional primary language of this document (BCP-47 tag, e.g., 'en', 'en-IN').

contacts.description: Optional role-based contacts (e.g., support, security, press). Values should be email addresses.

extensions.description: Optional namespace for domain-specific or experimental fields. Agents should ignore unknown extensions.
